comments.comments_text: Stunning strike! Robin Gosens (Inter) latches on to a precise through ball from Lautaro Martinez before unleashing an unstoppable shot inside the right post from the edge of the area. Fantastic goal. The score is now 2:3.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Stunning strike! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) latches on to a precise through ball from [PLAYER] before unleashing an unstoppable shot inside the right post from the edge of the area. Fantastic goal. The score is now 2:3.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! A perfect cross from Eric Garcia finds Robert Lewandowski (Barcelona) who jumps highest and steers a bullet header from the centre of the box into the top left corner. His effort was both powerful and precise. Andre Onana had no chance of stopping it. 3:3.
